pages.title: Where's the Water?
pages.text: While collecting $(item)Marble$(), you may have noticed some strange lights, or maybe even a large glimmering crystal. The reason we collected $(item)Marble$() is for it's affinity to such things, and as such, it's ties to the $(theme)Astral Magicks$().

It's not the only such material though. The other is present in the $(item)Quicksoil$() of the $(thing)Aether$(), but will require coaxing by the Purification processes of a $(item)Pure Daisy$(). Hopefully we can figure out a way to make one.

pages.title: Quicksoil in the Aether
pages.text: Take care when gathering, lest you meet a quick end
